name: Living Cell
description:
Living Cell is a dark adventure game with elements of survival in a Samosbor setting.
Explore the living block room by room, avoid poisonous slimes and make sure that the filters of the gas mask do not die ahead of time, and the flashlight continues to work.
Learn about the frightening stories of the inhabitants of Gigakhrushchyovka by exploring their everyday life and surroundings.

Survive or become another consumable whose body will go to food concentrate after death.





  • Unique setting based on the Gigakhrushchyovka and Samosbor universe
  • Gloomy and oppressive atmospher of despair and decay
  • Unusual gameplay combining elements of a quest, survival and various puzzles
